VARIABLES.name: x_AppX
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppX

VARIABLES.name: x_AppY
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppY

VARIABLES.name: x_AppZ
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppZ

VARIABLES.name: x_AppW
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppW

VARIABLES.name: x_AppV
VARIABLES.description: Number of development teams allocated to AppV

OBJECTIVE.query: sum(p_i * x_i for p_i in [p_AppX, p_AppY, p_AppZ, p_AppW, p_AppV]) - sum(c_i * x_i for c_i in [c_AppX, c_AppY, c_AppZ, c_AppW, c_AppV])
OBJECTIVE.LaTeX: \max Z = \sum_{i \in \{	ext{AppX, AppY, AppZ, AppW, AppV}\}} \left( p_i \cdot x_i - c_i \cdot x_i ight)

CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppZ}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \ge 1
CONSTRAINTS.description: Each product must have at least one team working on it.
At least two teams are required to be assigned to the AppX development project.

CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \le 10
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total number of development teams assigned to AppX, AppY, AppW, and AppV combined must not exceed 10 teams.
The total number of development teams assigned to AppZ and AppV combined must not exceed 28 teams.

CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppZ}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \le 30
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total number of development teams assigned to all products must not exceed 30.
AppX must have at least twice as many development teams as AppY.

CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: x_{	ext{AppX}} + x_{	ext{AppY}} + x_{	ext{AppZ}} + x_{	ext{AppW}} + x_{	ext{AppV}} \le 30
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total number of development teams assigned to all products must not exceed 30.
The marketing cost for AppX cannot exceed $200,000.

CONSTRAINTS.query: sum(p_i * x_i for p_i in [p_AppX, p_AppY, p_AppZ, p_AppW, p_AppV]) <= 2500000
CONSTRAINTS.LaTeX: \sum_{i \in \{	ext{AppX, AppY, AppZ, AppW, AppV}\}} \left( p_i \cdot x_i ight) \le 2500000
CONSTRAINTS.description: The total marketing cost for all products must not exceed $2,500,000.
